A1: the identity or similarity of positions on
RelatedSentence: Under the document , the parties , noting the identity or similarity of positions on a number of important international and regional issues , will continue to strengthen coordination and cooperation within the UN , SCO , CICA and other international organizations and multilateral institutions .

Kyrgyzstan and China , supporting the central role of the UN in international affairs will strengthen cooperation within the framework of the UN and other multilateral formats , promote international order and the international system in the direction of fairness and reasonableness .
Parties support reasonable and necessary reform by the UN and its Security Council .
